props.heading: Comprehensive Plan

iterableData.description: Covers car repairs if your car is damaged in an accident.
Covers car theft, and car damage caused by fire, and natural calamities.
Covers car damage caused by rat bites.
Covers damage caused by your car to others and their property in case of an accident.

iterableData.display_name: Damage due to regular wear and tear
iterableData.description: Doesn’t cover natural wear and tear of parts like tyres, tubes, and engine.
Doesn’t cover damage caused to the car if it’s used for commercial activities (e.g. deliveries, transportation for a fee).
Doesn’t cover any damage suffered by your car before the purchase of this policy.
Doesn’t cover damage to your car or others if you are in violation of traffic laws at the time of the accident, for example, driving without a valid licence or under the influence of alcohol.

bannerData.text: Opt for additional covers in the next steps to enhance your car protection

iterableData.description: Cover engine and gearbox damage due to floods or heavy rains, as well as engine damage from oil/coolant leakage during an accident.

props.coverageDetails: This plan covers theft and damage to your car from accidents, fire, and natural disasters. It also covers accidental damage caused by your car to others and their property.

props.text: This plan is perfect for your car's age. It offers essential coverage at a great price.

props.heading: This is a FASTag linked plan that includes ₹

howItWorks.text: After your policy is issued, download the ACKO app
Enter the registration number of the vehicle and select your FASTag provider
Redeem the FASTag recharge that comes with your insurance plan
This benefit is applicable for all FASTag accounts except if your FASTag account is linked with Amazon pay

props.coverageDetails: This plan covers damage caused by your car to others and their property, but does not cover any damage caused to your car. It costs the same across all insurers.

props.text: This is the minimum coverage required by law. It is best suited for old cars with low market value.

props.heading: This is a FASTag linked plan that includes ₹

howItWorks.text: After your policy is issued, download the ACKO app
Enter the registration number of the vehicle and select your FASTag provider
Redeem the FASTag recharge that comes with your insurance plan
This benefit is applicable for all FASTag accounts except if your FASTag account is linked with Amazon pay

props.cueText: IDV is the maximum amount ACKO will pay you if your car is stolen or damaged beyond repair

props.text: For your 4-year-old Tata Nexon [2017-2023], we advise selecting an IDV of 3.1 lakh or more for maximum protection

props.cueText: IDV is the maximum amount ACKO will pay you if your car is stolen or damaged beyond repair

props.text: For your 4-year-old Tata Nexon [2017-2023], we advise selecting an IDV of 3.1 lakh or more for maximum protection

ncbMax.title: Maximum NCB unlocked!
ncbMax.ncbContent: You've earned the maximum No Claim Bonus (NCB) of 20%. We’ve applied the discount to your premium.

ncbProtect.title: Smart choice last year!
ncbProtect.ncbContent: As you bought No Claim Bonus (NCB) Protect add-on with your policy last year, your NCB hasn't reset to zero even though you claimed. We will apply 20% NCB discount on your renewal premium.

ncbIncrease.title: Here's your reward for staying claim-free
ncbIncrease.ncbContent: We've applied a 20% discount to your new plan since your NCB has increased from 0% to 20%

ncbResetPolicyExpired.title: About your No Claim Bonus (NCB)
ncbResetPolicyExpired.ncbContent: Since it's been 90 days that your policy expired, your No Claim Bonus (NCB) has reset to 20%. This is not just ACKO's policy; all insurers offer 20% NCB if a policy is renewed 90 days after policy expiry.

ncbResetPreviousPolicyClaim.title: About your No Claim Bonus (NCB)
ncbResetPreviousPolicyClaim.ncbContent: Since you claimed at least once in your last policy, your No Claim Bonus (NCB) has reset to 20%. This is not just ACKO's policy; all insurers offer 20% NCB in the year following a claim.

props.cardHeading: Save yourself from costly engine repairs
props.cardSubHeading: Cover engine and gearbox damage due to floods or heavy rains, as well as engine damage from oil/coolant leakage during an accident.

pa_owner_car.heading: Select the coverage amount for your Personal Accident Cover
pa_owner_car.description: Accidents can lead to huge medical bills, permanent disabilities, or death, which can impact your savings. With a Personal Accident cover:
coverageList: You’ll get 100% compensation (full sum insured) in case of permanent disability (loss of limbs or eyes).
You'll get 50% compensation in case of permanent disability (loss of one eye or limb)..
Your nominee gets 100% compensation (full sum insured) in the event of death

rsa_outstation_keyprotect_combo_car.heading:
Extra Car Protection
2 options available

props.heading: Select the sum you want to insure your products
props.subHeadingElectricalAccessoryNonElectric: Protect your car's electrical accessories like music system, speakers, etc. against theft, damage or loss
props.subHeadingElectricalAccessoryElectricVeh: Protect your car's electrical accessories like music system, speakers, etc. incl. battery charger against theft, damage or loss
props.subHeadingNonElectricalAccessory: Protect your car's non-electrical accessories like alloy wheels, seat covers, etc. against theft, damage or loss.
